author: ryanleeschneider
content: I didn't want to start a new thread since it seems related so I resurrected the "make execution requests a sidecar" thread with some questions around the builder spec (just mentioning here out of thread since people i didn't ping might be interested but probably wont see that the thread updated): https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1288408367068610585/1313989656714412034
